title: Difference to Product
text: The formula to express the difference of two sines is as follows: $$2cos\left(\frac{a+b}{2}\right) sin\left(\frac{a-b}{2}\right)$$.

title: Sine Properties
text: Because sine is an odd function, $$sin(-x)=-sin(x)$$. Use this property to rewrite negative angles as positive in the final answer.
